wathman hi apa jiwathwana samajayehi wiwidha madhyayange balapam saha pawul sansthawe thibena durwala kalamanakarana ka්ramawedayan nisa itha labala wiye di samahara du daruwo wiwaha diwiyata piwisethi.kamuka athdakim labannata pelambaena, ee sandaha sihina dakina daruwo da wethi.kuda wiye sitina mal kakuluwan du daruwan ge sithwala kamuka sithiwili ragayen ginigath sithiwili athikarannata atham madhyayan katayuthu karathi.samajaya adharmika wanawita, daruwan pilibandawa nosithana wita, me samajaye athiwiya haki khedaniya thaththwayan pilibandawa kalpana nokarana wita athiwiya haki thaththwaya bhayanakaya.madhyaya osse wikashanaya karana githa, telinatya, sinamapata pamanak nowe, mudranaya kara bedaharina sanga nisath ape warthamana daru parapura kamayen umathu bawata pathkara thibenawaya yanna mage adahasayi.budurajanan wahanse sandahan kalasema ada dawase awurudu asuwa ikmawa jiwathwana minisun itha alpaya.

eksath janapada rajaye jathika aarakshaka eejansiya ha ef.bi.ayi. aayathanaya mangin amerikanu purawasiyange durakathana ha antharjala sakachcha pilibanda wartha hora rahase ras kirime kriyawalin dekak pawathwagena yama anawaranaya wimen amerikanuwan athara mahath kalambaimak hatagena athayi pawase.adhi rahasya adhikarana niyogayak yatathe lath balaya anuwa amerikanu jathika aarakshaka eejansiya mangin amerikawe wishalathama durakathana sewa samagamak wana werison samagamen siya durakathana grahakayinge amathum sambandhayen thorathuru labadena lesa kala illimak anawaranaya wimen amerikanuwan mese kalambaimata pathwa thibe.ikuth badada brithanyaye gadiyan puwathpatha mangin mulinma mema rahasya kriyawaliya anawaranya kirimen pasu eya amerikanuwange paudgalikathwayata anisi balapamak ella karannak lesa salaki atha.widesha buddhi ansha sewa wimarshana adhikaranaya lesa handinwena rahas adhikaranayak mangin nikuth kala niyogayakata anuwa mese amerikanuwange durakathana sanwada wartha labaganna bawa gadiyan puwathpatha helidaraw kala athara pasuwa ikuth brahaspathinda ema puwathpatha ha woshintan post puwathpathen amerikanu jathika aarakshaka eejansiya ha ef.bi.ayi. aayathanaya ekwa sidu karana thawath ewani wadasatahanak gana anawaranaya kara atha.
